title: Outras Fontes releases Maryam
content:
Submitted by [outrasfontes](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001734/http:/www.typophile.com/user/16162 "View user profile.") : 8.Mar.2007 7.17pm 

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001734im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hello_3631.gif)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001734/http:/www.outrasfontes.com/)

The [Outras Fontes Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001734/http:/www.outrasfontes.com/) releases [Maryam](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001734/http:/www.outrasfontes.com/fonts.htm), a new a script type family designed by Ricardo Esteves Gomes. There are two fonts in the family: Maryam Regular and Maryam Alternate. Because of moderate contrast, these fonts have ellegant and very legible forms even in small x-height sizes. There are more than 70 ligatures in each font,providing a lot of letterform variations that can make this type family look like real handwriting on a page.

Maryam are avaliable to purchase at [MyFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001734/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/outras/maryam) for only $16,80 USD per font (until the end of March). Check it out!
author: outrasfontes
